caption.p: Principal component analysis (PCA) of the essential-oil composition of published T. montanum based on the principal classes of compounds: monoterpene hydrocarbons (MH), oxygenated monoterpenes (MO), sesquiterpenes hydrocarbons (SH), and oxygenated sesquiterpenes (OS) and others (O). The vectors shown are the eigenvectors of the covariance matrix. The plantsâ€™ codes are reported in Table 2.
